item.title: Is it worth stealing bases in 2023?
item.description: In the 2022 offseason, the MLB instituted rules that, among other changes, reduced the distance between bases by 4.5 inches. Doing so was intended to encourage steals, but is it ever worth stealing? Weâ€™ve done the numbers and here is our results: How do we calculate the value of a steal? We can use run expectancy to gain the expected run gain on a steal. To do this, we used a joint run-expectancy matrix from the last 7 years.
